      • removeFromLua

        public final ScriptContext removeFromLua(java.lang.String name)
        remove a global value from lua state
        参数:
        name - lua global name
        返回:

      • addToLua

        public final ScriptContext addToLua(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.Object obj)
        另请参阅:
        addToLua(String, Object, boolean)

      • addToLua

        public final ScriptContext addToLua(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.Object obj,
                                    boolean local)
        参数:
        name - lua global name
        obj - value,null to remove the global value
        local - false:the method to be added to all lua State true:the method to be added to only current state.
        返回:
        this

      • addToLua

        public ScriptContext addToLua(java.lang.String luaName,
                              java.lang.String methodName,
                              java.lang.Object instOrType)
                       throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        抛出:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        另请参阅:
        addToLua(String, String, Object, boolean)

      • addToLua

        public ScriptContext addToLua(java.lang.String luaName,
                              java.lang.String methodName,
                              java.lang.Object instOrType,
                              boolean local)
                       throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        参数:
        luaName - lua global name
        methodName - method name in the class
        instOrType - object for method or the declaring class
        local - false:the method to be added to all lua State true:the method to be added to only current state.
        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the method not found

        public java.lang.Object get(java.lang.String name)
